name: ListProjects
description:
Retrieve a list of projects.

Use this tool to obtain a list of projects. Requires the 'candidatesRead' permission.

parameters.name: page_results_cursor
parameters.description: An opaque cursor indicating which page of results to fetch from the project list.

value_schema.description: Opaque cursor indicating which page of results to fetch

parameters.name: last_sync_token
parameters.description: An opaque token from the last successful data sync. This is used to fetch updates.

value_schema.description: An opaque token representing the last time the data was successfully synced from the API. A new, updated one is returned after successfully fetching the last page of data.

parameters.name: max_items_to_return
parameters.description: The maximum number of projects to return. The default and maximum value is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return. The maximum and default value is 100.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Opaque cursor indicating which page of results to fetch

value_schema.description: Opaque cursor indicating which page of results to fetch

parameters.name: syncToken
parameters.description: An opaque token representing the last time the data was successfully synced from the API. A new, updated one is returned after successfully fetching the last page of data.

value_schema.description: An opaque token representing the last time the data was successfully synced from the API. A new, updated one is returned after successfully fetching the last page of data.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. The maximum and default value is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return. The maximum and default value is 100.
